alert.note: Alert for Big Island East; Big Island North; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Windward West; Molokai West; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued November 21 at 3:46AM HST until November 21 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF WARNING FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU AND MOLOKAI HAS BEEN CANCELLED... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU, KAUAI, OAHU AND MOLOKAI HAS BEEN CANCELLED.. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI MAUI AND THE BIG ISLAND... .The large north-northwest (340 degrees) swell that brought warning level surf Monday, will transition out of the north (350-360 degrees) today and continue to diminish for the next couple of days. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Large breaking waves of 15 to 20 feet, becoming 12 to 16 in the afternoon across north facing shores. * WHERE...Maui Windward West, Molokai West, Maui Central Valley North, Windward Haleakala, Big Island East and Big Island North. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST this evening. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.

area.areaDesc: Big Island East; Big Island North; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Windward West; Molokai West; Windward Haleakala
